thread.title: Model Wang Rui’er's 'boyfriend punched her so hard her breast almost exploded' | Metro News
thread.title_full: Model Wang Rui’er's 'boyfriend punched her so hard her breast almost exploded' | Metro News

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Model Wang Rui’er's 'boyfriend punched her so hard her breast almost exploded' | Metro News
text:
Richard Hartley-Parkinson for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 12:08 pm Wang Rui’er released a picture showing the injuries she sustained as a result of domestic violence (Picture: Asia Wire) 
A model has revealed that she has been the victim of domestic abuse for three years by releasing a picture of her injuries. 
Wang Rui’er published the picture showing her bruises which she said were caused by her boyfriend. Isis releases video showing German hostage being beheaded 
The 23-year-old, based in Beijing, shared the picture on Sina Weibo showing injuries to her face and body. 
The model’s right breast also bears what appears to be a laceration, and she went on to detail the abuse in her lengthy post. 
Her post, addressed to her now ex-boyfriend, read: ‘We’d been together for three years. I admit in the beginning I chose you because of your money, but I’ve also had to endure your torture and your beatings for three years. She said she had been a victim of abuse for three years (Picture: Asia Wire) 
‘Just think for a moment, I have plenty of suitors who are also very rich. If all I wanted was money, why would I have stayed with you for three years! 
‘Until last night, when you hit me so hard my breast almost exploded, I decided I could endure you no longer – even if you threw a wad of cash at me and promised to pay for my surgeries. 
‘So, yes, it’s over. Please, go away, get out of my life.’ 
The shocking revelation has had Weibo users wondering why Wang never thought to call the police. She has received a lot of support online after publishing the picture (Picture: Asia Aire) 
Reports have also yet to reveal whether authorities in Beijing are to intervene on the model’s behalf. 
Wang shot to internet fame in 2012 after taking part in a modelling contest. 
Having spent more than £117,075 transforming her body through plastic surgery, she had previously also been approached by Japan’s porn industry for a leading role, which she later turned down. More
